annotations.description: This Drink was created by Nitecap's Natascha David who is the proprietor the bar and opened it in connection with Alex Day and the proprietor's LLC (think De...
annotations.title: Exit Strategy - A Satisfying Nightcap Cocktail from NYC's Nitecap

textContent:
1.5oz (45ml) Amaro Nonino
.75oz (22.5ml) Cognac
.25oz (7.5ml) Meletti Amaro
Pinch Of Kosher Salt
Orange Peel Garnish

Stir over ice

title: Exit Strategy
